trans-unit.source: Specify IMEI numbers | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Specify IMEI numbers | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Intune lets administrators import IMEI numbers for mobile device platforms to help identify corporate-owned mobile devices
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Intune lets administrators import IMEI numbers for mobile device platforms to help identify corporate-owned mobile devices

trans-unit.source: Specify corporate-owned devices with international mobile equipment identity (IMEI) numbers
trans-unit.target: Specify corporate-owned devices with international mobile equipment identity (IMEI) numbers

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Intune enables administrators to import international mobile equipment identity (IMEI) numbers for mobile device platforms with an IMEI numbers to help identify corporate-owned mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Intune enables administrators to import international mobile equipment identity (IMEI) numbers for mobile device platforms with an IMEI numbers to help identify corporate-owned mobile devices.

trans-unit.source: Once enrolled in Intune, devices with imported IMEI numbers can be viewed under **Groups** > **Overview** > **All Devices**.
trans-unit.target: Once enrolled in Intune, devices with imported IMEI numbers can be viewed under **Groups** > **Overview** > **All Devices**.

trans-unit.source: **Device group** lists display devices with imported IMEI numbers as **Corporate** in the **Ownership** column.
trans-unit.target: **Device group** lists display devices with imported IMEI numbers as **Corporate** in the **Ownership** column.

trans-unit.source: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](http://manage.microsoft.com) choose **Groups** > **All Devices** > **All Corporate Pre-enrolled Devices** > **By IMEI (All platforms)**, and then choose **Add devices…**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](http://manage.microsoft.com) choose **Groups** > **All Devices** > **All Corporate Pre-enrolled Devices** > **By IMEI (All platforms)**, and then choose **Add devices…**.

trans-unit.source: You can add devices in two ways:
trans-unit.target: You can add devices in two ways:

trans-unit.source: **Upload a CSV file containing serial numbers** – Create a comma-separated value (.csv) list of two columns without a header, limited to 5000 devices or 5MB per csv file.
trans-unit.target: **Upload a CSV file containing serial numbers** – Create a comma-separated value (.csv) list of two columns without a header, limited to 5000 devices or 5MB per csv file.

trans-unit.source: <IMEI #1>
trans-unit.target: <IMEI #1>

trans-unit.source: <Device #1 Details>
trans-unit.target: <Device #1 Details>

trans-unit.source: <IMEI #2>
trans-unit.target: <IMEI #2>

trans-unit.source: <Device #2 Details>
trans-unit.target: <Device #2 Details>

trans-unit.source: This .csv file when viewed in a text editor appears as:
trans-unit.target: This .csv file when viewed in a text editor appears as:

trans-unit.source: **Manually add device details** - Enter the IMEI number and device details of up to five devices
trans-unit.target: **Manually add device details** - Enter the IMEI number and device details of up to five devices

trans-unit.source: *Details* are for administrative use so you can identify which IMEI number is associated with a device.
trans-unit.target: *Details* are for administrative use so you can identify which IMEI number is associated with a device.

trans-unit.source: This information is not sent to the device but will appear in the Intune console.
trans-unit.target: This information is not sent to the device but will appear in the Intune console.

trans-unit.source: Choose **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Choose **Next**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Review Devices** pane you can confirm which device IMEI numbers are imported.
trans-unit.target: On the **Review Devices** pane you can confirm which device IMEI numbers are imported.

trans-unit.source: You can also decide whether to overwrite the **Details** for IMEI numbers being re-imported.
trans-unit.target: You can also decide whether to overwrite the **Details** for IMEI numbers being re-imported.

trans-unit.source: You can uncheck the **Overwrite** checkbox to preserve the Current details.
trans-unit.target: You can uncheck the **Overwrite** checkbox to preserve the Current details.

trans-unit.source: Choose **Finish** to import the IMEI numbers.
trans-unit.target: Choose **Finish** to import the IMEI numbers.

trans-unit.source: The added IMEI numbers and descriptions are added to the **By IMEI (All platforms)** list.
trans-unit.target: The added IMEI numbers and descriptions are added to the **By IMEI (All platforms)** list.

trans-unit.source: When the device with that IMEI number enrolls, usually when a user installs the Company Portal app and completes the enrollment process, the device will be tagged as Corporate owned and appear as enrolled in the **IMEI Devices** group.
trans-unit.target: When the device with that IMEI number enrolls, usually when a user installs the Company Portal app and completes the enrollment process, the device will be tagged as Corporate owned and appear as enrolled in the **IMEI Devices** group.
